properties.description: Notebook that orchestrates ETL Processes defined in the ODW package

source:
from odw.core.etl.etl_process_factory import ETLProcessFactory
from odw.core.io.data_io_factory import DataIOFactory
from odw.core.io.parser.data_file_parser_factory import DataFileParserFactory
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from typing import Dict, Any, Union
import json

source_metadata = input_arguments.pop("source_data")
source_data_map = dict()
data_read_error_map = dict()
for data_name, metadata in source_metadata.items():
    try:
        storage_kind = metadata.get("storage_kind", None)
        file_format = metadata.get("file_format", None)
        if not storage_kind:
            raise ValueError(f"Expected a storage_kind parameter to be passed, but this was missing")
        if not file_format:
            raise ValueError(f"Expected a file_format parameter to be passed, but this was missing")
        data_io_inst = DataIOFactory.get(storage_kind)()
        data = data_io_inst.read(spark=spark, **metadata)
        # parser_inst = DataFileParserFactory.get(file_format)(spark)
        # data = parser_inst.from_bytes(data_bytes)
        source_data_map[data_name] = data
    except Exception as e:
        data_read_error_map[data_name] = e

spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
entity_stage_name = input_arguments.get("entity_stage_name")
etl_process_class = ETLProcessFactory.get(entity_stage_name)
etl_process_instance = etl_process_class(spark)
